data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Usak to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Usak, Turkey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Usak, Turkey to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.section_summary: On average, 21 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Usak, Turkey.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Usak, Turkey, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Usak, Turkey.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Hemshin people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Hemshin people know you.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Usak to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Usak, Turkey to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.section_summary:
the state of Usak, Turkey has a population of 346,500.

We estimate Usak has 130 people who might know Jesus, 1,940 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 344,430 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2,665 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Usak unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
